tasks.label: SSN + ID Card
tasks.description: You have to have a valid social security card and ID card. You can verify with any staff.

tasks.label: Typing Assessment
tasks.description: Complete a typing assessment at www.Typingtest.com in the computer lab. Verification required. Please see Rasheeda for details. 3 minute assessment using any story. Please record results on task list or print results and place in Task List Drop Box (located behind Computer Lab Instructors desk).

tasks.label: 16 Personalities Assessment
tasks.description: Go to 16personalities.com and complete the free assessment. This is an extended version of the Brain Typing Questionnaire. Jot down your 4 letters and send your results to your email.
